org.resthub.identity.service

Class GroupServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.core.service.GenericServiceImpl<TEntity,Long,TDao>
      • org.resthub.identity.service.AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<Group,PermissionsOwnerDao<Group>>
        • org.resthub.identity.service.GroupServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericService<Group,Long>, GroupService, TracableService

    @Named(value="groupService")
public class GroupServiceImpl
extends AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<Group,PermissionsOwnerDao<Group>>
implements GroupService
    An implementation of a Group Service
    It's based on both GenericResourceServiceImpl and GroupService It's a bean whose name is "groupService"
